name: RSS Feed Reader by Enebrus Kem Lem
author: Enebrus Kem Lem C.A.

sections.description:
RSS Feed Reader by Enebrus Kem Lem allows you to automatically publish content in your site from external RSS feeds.

This plugin publish each feed entry summary in your site and keeps the link to the original site because as it is not
your post then is necessary to give credits to who made it.

We offers the following features:

  • Create many RSS Feed sources as needed.
  • Schedule the RSS feed update frequency.
  • Extract feed post pictures using tag index or xpath.
  • Allow to set the tag attribute where picture URL is.
  • Use whole attribute content or regular expressions to extract the picture URL.
  • Fetch RSS feed data when save if necessary.

To use this plugin it is necessary to have some knowledge about HTML, XPath and regular expressions. But don not worry,
if you need help ask us and we will help you.

Upcoming changes

Awesome! there are changes coming soon:

  • Allow categorize RSS Items.
  • Check multiple attributes to get post picture source.

Changes can come from our internal team or from plugin users requests.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ekl-rss-feed-reader.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to RSS sources menu item in your WordPress admin panel and start configuring the RSS feed sources.
  4. Set the RSS source thumbnail because it will be used to know the properties (ej. size) for post thumbnails.
sections.faq:
Awesome! We do not have questions yet, but we will update this list with the frequently asked questions that plugin
users send us.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • Open post link in a new tab.

1.0.6

  • Verify if plugin files are being called directly from browser.
  • Open post link in a new tab.

1.0.5

  • Fix the RSS post thumbnail to be applied only to RSS posts instead to any attachment.
  • Fix the version label to use only numbers.

1.0.4

  • Fix the custom post type name.
  • Add an upgrade section to perform required after-upgrade actions.

1.0.3

  • Fix issue with cron job action.

1.0.2

  • Upgrade Readme file.

1.0.1

  • Create many RSS Feed sources as needed.
  • Schedule the RSS feed update frequency.
  • Extract feed post pictures using tag index or xpath.
  • Allow to set the tag attribute where picture URL is.
  • Use whole attribute content or regular expressions to extract the picture URL.
  • Fetch RSS feed data when save if necessary.

short_description: Reads RSS Feeds automatically and publish their posts in your site linking the original site.

upgrade_notice.1.0.5: Fix the thumbnail URL used when showing the RSS Item information or list, because it was colliding with another attachments URL.
upgrade_notice.1.0.4: Fix custom post type name. After install this you must go to RSS Feed Sources > Upgrade section
upgrade_notice.1.0.3: Fix an issue in the cron job action what did avoid the RSS feed sources processing. Upgrade immediately.
upgrade_notice.1.0.2: This version adds the README.txt file to give you more information about this awesome plugin.
